MultiFeature.Name: Bead of Curing
MultiFeature.Text: The bead contains the cure wounds spell at 2nd level or the lesser restoration spell that you can cast from it as a bonus action (using your spell save DC if a save is necessary). Once a magic bead's spell is cast, that bead can't be used again until the next dawn.
